character_info.name: Leafmote
character_info.hint: who recommended this and why did you recommend it

sections.info: '''Leafmote''' is a version of [[Remote]] that is [[Leafy]] shaped
sections.obtaining: Go to Abandonment and then go to a light part of the wall near [[Hanheld]] and press the button and walk around and you will find '''Leafmote'''

wiki_markup:
[[File:YoylefactoryRealm.png|2000px]]
{{CharacterInfo |name=Leafmote |character=[[File:Leafmote.png]] |difficulty=[[File:Dreadful.png|link=]] '''Dreadful''' |area=[[Yoyle Factory/Abandonment|Yoyle Factory]] |hint=who recommended this and why did you recommend it |additionalinfo }} == Info == '''Leafmote''' is a version of [[Remote]] that is [[Leafy]] shaped == Obtaining == '''''The following text will show instructions on how to get this object. If you wish to find it by yourself, avoid opening the text.'''''
Go to Abandonment and then go to a light part of the wall near [[Hanheld]] and press the button and walk around and you will find '''Leafmote'''
